keyword: calories in in n out burger
title: Calories in In-N-Out Burger
meta_description: Discover calories in in n out burger, including macros like protein and fat, full nutrition breakdown, and easy tweaks for variations.
assumptions: Standard In-N-Out Hamburger: fresh beef patty, bun, lettuce, tomato, onion, Thousand Island-style spread; no cheese or modifications.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, customizations, and exact preparation. Check In-N-Out's official nutrition info or app for latest values.

quick_answer.text: One standard In-N-Out burger provides ~390 kcal and 16 g protein.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Make it Animal Style (extra spread, grilled onions, mustard-fried patty)
Double the patty (like Double-Double, minus cheese)

faqs.q: How many calories in in n out burger?
faqs.a: A standard In-N-Out Hamburger has about 390 calories.

faqs.q: What's the protein in an In-N-Out burger?
faqs.a: Approximately 16 g of protein per burger.

faqs.q: Are In-N-Out burgers high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 730 mg sodium per burger due to the spread and seasoning.

faqs.q: Calories in In-N-Out cheeseburger vs. hamburger?
faqs.a: Cheeseburger adds ~50 kcal, totaling about 440 calories.

faqs.q: Does customizing an In-N-Out burger change calories much?
faqs.a: Yesâ€”options like extra patties or Animal Style can add 200+ kcal.
